data.title: Lora Lee (Baker) White (1882-1929)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Explore genealogy for Lora (Baker) White born 1882 Marion, West Virginia, United States died 1929 Kansas City, Wyandotte, Kansas, United States including ancestors + descendants + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Ancestors

[spouse(s) unknown]

Descendants

Profile last modified 28 Mar 2022 | Created 23 Mar 2022

This page has been accessed 48 times.

Biography

Daughter of Oder Philander Baker and Rachel Ann Straight.[1]

When Lora Lee was age 17, in 1900, she was enumerated in her parents' household in Lewis County, West Virginia.[2]

She married Edson Ellsworth White, a saw miller, 5 July 1906 at Camden, Lewis, West Virginia.[3]

E E White and Lora White in 1910 were living at Hackers Creek, Lewis, West Virginia. Their daughter Freda was age 2. Their son Edward White was an infant. E E White was age 28.[4]

In 1920 Elsworth E White and wife Lora were living in Lewis County, West Virginia. Their children were: Freda M White, age 12; Jennings E. White, age 10; Odor P White, age 8; Mildred R White, age 6 and Kenneth B White, age 3.[5]

According to FindAGrave, she died in Kansas City, Wyandotte, Kansas. She is buried in Weston, Lewis, West Virginia. FindAGrave has a birth date of Feb 1883 which is not consistent with the birth record.[6]

Sources

↑ "West Virginia Births and Christenings, 1853-1928", database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:V2CL-4M4 : 12 December 2019), Lora Lee Baker, 1882.

↑ "United States Census, 1900," database with images, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:M9C5-4NT : accessed 23 March 2022), Lora L Baker in household of Odo? P Baker, Freeman's Creek district (east side), Lewis, West Virginia, United States; citing enumeration district (ED) 61, sheet 6A, family 103, NARA microfilm publication T623 (Washington, D.C.: National Archives and Records Administration, 1972.); FHL microfilm 1,241,763.

↑ http://archive.wvculture.org/vrr/va_view2.aspx?FilmNumber=825114&ImageNumber=393

↑ "United States Census, 1910," database with images, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:MPNT-2WP : accessed 23 March 2022), Laura White in household of E E White, Hackers Creek, Lewis, West Virginia, United States; citing enumeration district (ED) ED 52, sheet 14A, family 257, NARA microfilm publication T624 (Washington D.C.: National Archives and Records Administration, 1982), roll 1685; FHL microfilm 1,375,698.

↑ "United States Census, 1920", database with images, FamilySearch (https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:MNKK-3MV : 4 February 2021), Lora L White in entry for Elsworth E White, 1920.
